nodes.title: Description
nodes.body: Tormas, of course, are offered as parts of many rituals, but torma rituals are often found as independent rituals in their own right.

nodes.title: Related Terms
nodes.body: gtor chog, mchod gtor ‘bul ba’i cho ga, gtor ‘bul [TBRC T1219], gtor bsngo[s] TBRC T1209.

nodes.title: Related Texts
nodes.body: A work on the different types of tormas offered to dharma protectors is TBRC W3201.

nodes.title: Secondary Sources
nodes.body: Kohn, Richard J. "An Offering of Torma." In Religions of Tibet in Practice, edited by Donald Lopez, 255-265. Princeton: Princeton University Press, 1997.
